summary: Frontend testing of new pricing page and interactive features. All 8 requested features verified successfully: Pricing page loads with all sections, billing toggle works (Monthly/Annual), custom plan calculator is interactive, navigation has Pricing link, Interactive Dashboards work on all 3 solution overview pages, and Video Walkthrough plays on Banks page.
test_credentials: N/A - Static marketing pages, no auth required
context_for_next_testing_agent: Pricing page and interactive features are fully functional. InteractiveDashboard component shows live-updating metrics on solution overview pages. VideoWalkthrough uses Pexels stock videos.

sections_verified: Hero section with 'Pricing built for business maturity'
Enterprise Operating System badge with NEW tag
Most Popular badge on Growth plan
Why This Pricing Makes Sense section
CTA section with Start Free Trial and Talk to Sales

billing_toggle.save_badge: Save 17% badge visible on Annual toggle

navigation_pricing_link.description: Pricing link visible in SharedNavigation and navigates correctly

video_walkthrough_banks_page.video_description: See how to manage all your bank accounts in one place

ui_screenshots_taken: 01_pricing_page.png - Pricing page hero with billing toggle

verification_summary.pricing_page: Fully functional with all sections, billing toggle, and custom calculator
verification_summary.interactive_dashboards: All 3 solution overview pages have working InteractiveDashboard with live metrics
verification_summary.video_walkthrough: Banks page video plays correctly with Pexels stock footage
verification_summary.navigation: Pricing link present in SharedNavigation and works correctly
verification_summary.design_quality: ClearTax-style interactive design implemented with animations, gradients, and hover effects
